Package src.core

package src.core
Core package, contains The classes that define the Gameloop accoring to MVC (Model: Gameloop, View: Renderer, Control: Controller) principle. Values that are static for the whole game can be stored in the StaticValues file.
See Also:
  • Renderer
  • Controller
  • Gameloop
  • StaticValues
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    src
     
    src.assets
    Asset package, contains classes to load and manage assets like sounds and images.
    src.components
    Component package, contains all basic components which can be used in Scenes or for other Components.
    src.scenes
    Scene package, contains classes to create and handle different Scenes.
  • Class
    Description
    Controller
    Handles Player input
    Gameloop
    Handles Events regarding the gameloop.
    Renderer
    Renders the game view to the screen
    StaticValues
    Dataclass to store fixed values
    StaticValues.Corners
    Available Rectangle corners
    StaticValues.FieldState
    Possible states a Field can have
    StaticValues.Mode
    Avaiable Modes for the Minefield scene
    StaticValues.SceneTag
    Available Tags for a Scene
